name: Pickup & Delivery from Customer Locations for WooCommerce
author: powerfulwp

sections.description:
Developed by PowerfulWP | Premium | Documents

Pickup & Delivery from Customer Locations for WooCommerce

  • Let customers add their pickup location on checkout.
    The pickup location is shown on the order thank you page, emails, and customers account order details.
  • Let admin set the pickup settings, view and edit the pickup location on the admin panel order page.

WHO CAN USE THIS PLUGIN?

Any business that needs to pick up from a customer locations can use this plugin.
For example:

  • Delivery service companies.
  • Logistics companies.
  • Anything else

* PREMIUM FEATURES

Check out the Pickup & Delivery from Customer Locations for WooCommerce Premium plugin.
The premium plugin includes the following additional features:

PICKUP LIMITATIONS

Enable pickup from customers for all products or specific products.

SUPPORTED ON THE FOLLOWING PLUGINS

  • Local Delivery Drivers for WooCommerce Premium plugin.
  • Delivery Drivers manager Premium plugin.
  • Autocomplete Address and Location Picker for WooCommerce plugin.

SVG created by fontawesome – www.fontawesome.com
People vector created by pch.vector – www.freepik.com
sections.installation:
1. Make a backup of your website and database
  2. Download the plugin
  3. Upload the plugin to the wp-content/plugins directory,
  4. Go to “plugins” in your WordPress admin, then click activate.
  5. You will now see the pickup menu on the admin panel’s left side.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release.

= 1.0.2
* fix: Freemius SDK security fix.

= 1.0.3
* tweak: New Action before pickup checkout form – pdfclw_before_checkout_pickup_form
* tweak: New Action after pickup checkout form – pdfclw_after_checkout_pickup_form

= 1.0.4
* tweak: Get the checkout pickup address filter for drsfwp plugin.

= 1.0.5
* Tweak: Enable different pickup address is optional.
* Tweak: Woocommerce HPOS feature support.
* Tweak: Freemius SDK version 2.6.2.

short_description: Are you running a delivery service business? Let customers add their pickup location on the WooCommerce checkout.
